entries.context: redact sensitive method details + remove availability blurb
notes: Removed availability/design-partner callout from Contact section
Replaced Soft-KAN/Lipschitz-minimal specifics with outcome-focused wording
Kept benefits (abstention, active learning) without implementation detail
Rationale: avoid disclosing method internals while preserving clarity for visitors
Applied color-scheme: dark at :root so native controls render dark
Forced dropdown option colors: .field select option { background:#0f1724; color: var(--text) }
Placeholder option styled muted; control background darkened for contrast
Deleted Docs link and Frontiers section; cleaned nav
Added contact email mailto in Contact section and footer
Reason: user request; keeps site focused and provides direct contact channel
Changed header brand text to BUSLEYDEN and aria-label to BUSLEYDEN home
Kept KAN-Infinity as product name in hero/footer (flagship product)
Wrapped overview paragraphs in copy-panel with glass card look
Added prose styles: larger lead, 1.7 line-height, improved colors
Added divider utility (unused yet) for future separation
Goal: better legibility and hierarchy without changing wording
Body font increased to 17px/1.65; section padding to 96px
H1/H2 scale increased; lead text larger
Bigger gaps for metrics, pills, check list, facts; larger pill sizes
Callout padding/margins increased; facts cards emphasized
Goal: significantly more air and legibility on desktop/mobile
